name: ChatGPT
description: General-purpose AI assistant for writing, coding, and brainstorming.
longDescription: Chat-based AI model that helps with writing, coding, analysis, tutoring, and more.

name: Claude
description: AI assistant oriented toward helpfulness and safety.
longDescription: Strong general language model for analysis, Q&A, and ideation with long context.

name: Gemini
description: Google's multimodal AI that understands text, images, and more.
longDescription: Useful for search, content generation, and integrating with Google ecosystem.

name: Midjourney
description: Text-to-image generation via Discord with artistic styles.
longDescription: Generate high-quality, stylized images from text prompts in Discord channels.

name: DALL·E
description: Create and edit images from text prompts or uploaded pictures.
longDescription: Powerful image generation and editing capabilities for creatives and marketers.

name: Stable Diffusion
description: Open source image generation models and tools.
longDescription: Run models locally or via services to generate and edit images.

name: Notion AI
description: AI in Notion for summarizing, drafting, and organizing docs.
longDescription: Built into Notion to help write, summarize, and automate tasks in your workspace.

name: GitHub Copilot
description: AI pair programmer that suggests code in your editor.
longDescription: Speeds up coding by suggesting entire functions and tests in real time.

name: Perplexity
description: Answer engine with citations for research and browsing.
longDescription: Great for finding sources quickly with concise answers and references.
